name: Natural Soaps
description:
We love to make natural soaps and we understand the importance of using all natural ingredients that will nourish the skin. We start with our basic soap recipe, made with rich, penetrating oils.  The best conditioning oils for your skin are based on the content of their fatty acids, the building blocks of fat molecules, especially oleic and linoleic acids. Shea butter contains 50% oleic acid. Coconut (lauric acid) produces an amazing fluffy lather and has antimicrobial properties!

So whether you are shopping for a personal bar for yourself, or a special someone, you won't be disappointed with our selections! (see our ingredient list by clicking on the link under info at right)

name: Coconut Body Cream
description: Our body cream is made with organic coconut milk! Coconut milk is rich in lauric acid, an important essential fatty acid used by the body to maintain its immune system. It is naturally antiseptic ridding the skin of impurities. We also add a bit of shea butter for extra moisturizing, and hydrolyzed oatmeal for protein nourishment. Rich, thick, and luxurious! A little goes a long way! 7 oz jar

name: Bath Fizzies (round)
description: Bath fizzies add fun to bath! They make great gifts too! Made with sweet almond and essential oils for a heavenly aroma-therapeutic  experience! 5 oz

name: Body Butter, Herbal Salves
description:
Our herbal salves are made with extra-virgin olive oil, deep penetrating and effective in relieving dry, cracked skin. size: 1 oz tin

Orange-Ginger: The scent of citrus and ginger together make for a spiritual awakening.  Ginger has been used through the ages to increase circulation to heal dry damaged skin and these 2 aromas together....LOOK OUT! Great for stretch marks too! 

Berry-Spicy: Juniper, ginger, with a touch of star anise create a warm yummy spice medley that is calming to the senses. Rosemary has been used for eons to heal and condition dry skin.  Great for stretch marks too! 

Lemon & Holy Basil: Holy basil is considered a "cure all" in India where it is used to treat everything from eczema to rheumatoid arthritis. This very aromatic herb is considered to have magic healing powers. Lemon basil adds a delicate lemony scent. Great for stretch marks too!

Baby's First Bum Salve: Diaper Rash Relief: Gentle acting but effective. Made with Calendula for rash control, olive oil to sooth and protect from wetness with a bit of chamomile and lavender to calm and pacify.

Nipple Balm: Relief from sore, cracked nipples. Every mother who plans on breastfeeding should have some on hand. Made with analgesic, anti-inflammatory and antibacterial herbs.  

(see ingredient list under info at right)
